section.title: Compatibility
section.para: Release 3.3 of GlusterFS is not compatible with 2.0.x, 3.0.x, 3.1.x, and 3.2.x releases of GlusterFS.

section.title: Upgrade
section.para: Red Hat recommends that you back up your data before upgrading to GlusterFS 3.3.

note.para: Configurations generated outside the scope of gluster CLI are neither recommended nor supported by Red Hat.

section.title: Upgrade from GlusterFS v3.2.x or 3.1.x to GlusterFS v3.3
section.para: In an environment with replicated bricks it is recommended that you upgrade a single storage server, confirm stability, and then upgrade the replica.
Use the same installation method for the upgrade as the original glusterfs installation.
